goal.ch: 使學生了解複數解析函數、柯西定理、複數級數、殘值積分方法與應用、以及拉普拉斯與傅立葉逆轉換原理。
goal.en: This course introduces students the fundamental concept and mathematical methods of complex analytic functions including differentiation and integration, the Cauchy integration theorem, complex series, residue integration methods, and inverse Laplace and Fourier transformation.

outline.ch:
週次內容備註
1複數解析函數
2複數微分
3Cauchy-Riemann 方程式
4基本複數函數
5曲線積分
6Cauchy 積分理論
7Cauchy 積分延伸公式
8指數級數
9Taylor 級數
10Laurent 級數
11Cauchy 殘值定裡
12奇異點
13殘值積分
14殘值積分應用
15拉普拉斯與傅立葉逆轉換
16期末測驗
17彈性周
18彈性周
outline.en:
週次內容備註
1Complex analytic functions
2Complex differentiation
3Cauchy-Riemann Equations
4Complex elementary functions
5Contour Integral
6Cauchy’s Integral theorem
7Extension of Cauchy’s integral formula
8Power series
9Taylor series
10Laurent series
11Cauchy’s residues theorem
12Singular points
13Residue integration
14Applications of residues
15Inverse Laplace and Fourier Transformation
16Final Exam
17TBD
18TBD

textbook.ch:
教科書(英文)：
Edward B. Saff and David Snider, Fundamentals of Complex Analysis with Applications to Engineering, Science, and Mathematics, Pearson, 3rd Ed. reprint 2014.

參考書(英文)：
1. E/ Kreyszig, Advanced Engineering Mathematics, John Wiley, 10th ed. 2011.
2. J. W. Brown and R. V. Churchill, Complex Variables and Applications, McGraw-Hill, 9th ed. 2014. 
3. John H. Mathews and Russell W. Howell, Complex Analysis for Mathematics And Engineering, Jones and Bartlett Learning, 6th ed. 2012.
textbook.en:
教科書(英文)：
Edward B. Saff and David Snider, Fundamentals of Complex Analysis with Applications to Engineering, Science, and Mathematics, Pearson, 3rd Ed. reprint 2014.

參考書(英文)：
1. E/ Kreyszig, Advanced Engineering Mathematics, John Wiley, 10th ed. 2011.
2. J. W. Brown and R. V. Churchill, Complex Variables and Applications, McGraw-Hill, 9th ed. 2014. 
3. John H. Mathews and Russell W. Howell, Complex Analysis for Mathematics And Engineering, Jones and Bartlett Learning, 6th ed. 2012.
